title: Peer Advisory Group Learning Project for Sustainable Agricultural Practices

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Learner role: Professionals (medical/legal/technical) | Domain expertise: Advanced | Subject area: Applied mathematics | Assessment method: Formative assessment-centered

learning_goals: Learners can analyze sustainable agricultural practice cases in peer advisory groups and validate them through mathematical modeling.
Learners can implement collaborative projects using Problem-Based Learning (PBL) approaches to solve complex problems encountered in agricultural settings.
Learners can quantitatively compare and evaluate the environmental and economic effects of adopting sustainable agricultural technologies.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
